summary: This document contains email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey. The communication indicates that they are trying to coordinate a breakfast meeting and that Jeffrey is hesitant to make a decision until the following week.

events.title: Tentative Meeting Scheduling
events.description: Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff discuss scheduling a breakfast meeting with Jeffrey on October 10.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Lesley Groff is involved in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey.
The meeting is tentatively set for October 10, 2013.
Caroline's assistant confirmed availability for a breakfast meeting.
Jeffrey is hesitant to make a decision about the meeting until the following week.
